content: Prayer for the Destruction of the Treacherous.
To the Chief Musician; with stringed instruments. A skillful song,  a didactic  reflective poem, of David.
And do not hide Yourself from my plea.
Listen to me and answer me;
I am restless  distraught in my complaint and distracted
Because of the voice of the enemy,
Because of the pressure of the wicked;
For they bring down trouble on me,
And in anger they persecute me.
